page.title: 09NEWSPAPERS IN A-IN-M
page.content:
In Ashton we have five free newspapers a week; the Wigan Reporter; The Leader; Property Scene; Star Extra; and the Winwick Reporter.
These newspapers tell you what is happening, what is for sale and about sport. They sometimes advertise jobs and always advertise shops and firms.
The Property Scene shows houses for sale and gives a brief description about them.
The Wigan Reporter has a lot of pages about Wigan Football Club which is in the Third Division. It also tells you about Wigan Rugby League Football Club, which is very good and has been to Wembly Stadium recently.
A newspaper can be very {useful.}
